For the herb salad: small handful each fresh chives, parsley, basil, mint, chopped
For the salmon: small handful fresh dill, finely chopped

steps: Put all the salmon ingredients into a bowl and stir to coat to salmon well. Cover with cling film and leave to marinate for ten minutes. Slice thinly.
To make the herb salad, put the herbs into a large bowl and squeeze over the lemon juice and olive oil. Mix until the herbs are well coated.
To serve, put the herb salad on a plate and top with the slices of marinated salmon.
title: Lemon and dill-marinated salmon with herb salad
